data.text: Litsuwa lya Sabato halimalile, lupfilipfili litsuwa lye mwanduso lye lijuma, Mariya Magidalena na Mariya yungi waghenda kulola likabuli.
Tsakulawila mdedemo mkulu we isi, kwaapfila malaika we Imtwatsa tsakahulumka kulawa kulanga, kaghenda mne likabuli kalibingilisa libwe hambali, kalikalila.
Chihanga chake tsachikala ka lumwesa, na lighwanda lyake tsalitselu chwee!
Iwanu iwang'ali wokalitsa wapfuka ghendo, wadedema na woneka ka wafa.
Malaika ayo kawalongela iwapinga, “Mleke kupfuka, kwaapfila nomanya mwombama Yesu iyawambighwe mna msalaba.
Ng'alibaha bae, katsilihuka ka pfayalongile. Mtse mlole hanu hayawasile.
Lelo msumke mghende, muwalongelele pfino iwanang'ina wake. ‘Yesu katsilihuka, naye katsowalongola kughenda Galilaya. Baho mtsomwona.’ Haya lelo, ma niwalongela.”
Apfo iwapinga awo wasumka kuka kulawa hane likabuli, kwa kupfuka na ndeng'elelo ng'ulu, watsuma waghenda kuwalongela iwanang'ina wake.
Bahala Yesu ketingana nawo, kawalongela, “Nowalamsani.” Wamghendela, wakinda ghamaghulu ghake, wamtamanila.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Mleke kupfuka. Mghende mkawalongele wandughu tsangu waghende Galilaya, ako watsombona.”
Iwapinga hawang'ali wamnzila, asikali wangi mna awala iwakalitse likabuli waghenda kune ghumji wawalongela watambika wakulu chila chinu ichilawile.
Iwakulu we inambiko hawetingane ne iwabala wapanga imbuli yawo, waweng'a sendi nyingi awala iwakalitse likabuli,
kuya wawalongela, “Walongeleni pfino iwanu, ‘Iwanang'ina wake watsa nechilo, wamwiba hatuwasile.’
Na imkulu we isi ang'ahulika mbuli ino, twetwe tutsolonga naye, namwe ng'amtsokwingila mne maghayo.”
Apfo awala asikali wasola sendi, na watenda ka pfawalongelighwe. Na mbuli ayo yenela kwe Wayahudi mbaka leloli.
Kuya iwanang'ina kumi na yumwe waghenda Galilaya kune chidunda, ako Yesu kwayawalongele waghende.
Hawamwonile, wamtamanila lekeni wangi wapfuka.
Yesu kawaghendela, kawalongela, “Ukulu wose uli kulanga na uli muisi ning'ighwa nene.
Apfo, mghende mkawatende iwanu we isi tsose wawe wanang'ina wangu, muwabatitse kwa taghwa lya Aba na Imwana na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka,
na muwalangulitse kughakinda aghala ghose ghaniwalaghitse. Na nene na hamwe namwe ghamatsuwa ghose mbaka iisi haitsomala.”
